item.description:
Agenda:

- Folks, please share 1 suggestion you might have learned from participating at James Ray’s event on Sept 3rd: The Secret of Attracting the Life You Want

- Stefan Pagacik, BostonLOA member, shares his experiences from using 2 processes that have helped him use the Law of Attraction more consistently towards manifesting his huge dreams. These processes are taught by Dr. Joe Vitale, another teacher featured in “The Secret”.

The processes respectively relate to Ho’Oponopono and a Cleaning and Clearing Method. They help you identify, isolate, and eliminate counter-intentions that are currently attracting undesired results into your life.

You will learn these powerful 2 processes and discuss your experiences in smaller groups.


"Below the surface (of your conscious thoughts), a complex and deep-seated collection of beliefs are exerting an extremely powerful magnetic force in your life.

When these subconscious thoughts are in harmony with what you consciously intend, you attract it..." - Dr. Joe Vitale

- Open Discussion: Bring your question &/or situation you would like help with. Please be specific about your LOA-related challenge. Our experienced members can share some tips and ideas.


About Stefan Pagacik
http://www.greenpoint...
to contact Stefan: stefan@greenpointma.com

Besides being an enthusiastic student and "practice-ioner" of Law Of Attraction, Stefan is also a successful consultant bridging several industries including media and entertainment, software/IT, private equity and technology.

Most recently, Stefan has formed Greenpoint, a global venture growth consultancy helping early-stage technology companies and eco-focused projects and/or companies realize market and financial milestones leading to exit via sale, merger or IPO.

================

Do check our Message Board for info/ discussions from members. You're welcome to post LOA-related topics/ discussions there too.

group.name: The Boston Law of Attraction Meetup Group

item.name: BostonLOA Meetup - IN PERSON
